dimension.name: four
dimension.desc: Number of glacier variables in integer array

dimension.name: mxnsos
dimension.desc: Maximum number of storage/outflow table values for storage-detention reservoirs and lakes connected to the stream network using Puls routing

dimension.name: ncascade
dimension.desc: Number of HRU links for cascading flow

dimension.name: ncascdgw
dimension.desc: Number of GWR links for cascading flow

dimension.name: ncbh
dimension.desc: Number of values specified in CBH files (active HRUs)

dimension.name: nconsumed
dimension.desc: Number of consumptive water-use destinations

dimension.name: ndays
dimension.desc: Maximum number of days in a year

dimension.name: ndepl
dimension.desc: Number of snow-depletion curves

dimension.name: ndeplval
dimension.desc: Number of values in all snow-depletion curves (set to ndepl*11)

dimension.name: nevap
dimension.desc: Number of pan-evaporation data sets

dimension.name: nexternal
dimension.desc: Number of external water-use sources or destinations

dimension.name: ngate
dimension.desc: Maximum number of reservoir gate-opening values (columns) for lake rating table 1

dimension.name: ngate2
dimension.desc: Maximum number of reservoir gate-opening values (columns) for lake rating table 2

dimension.name: ngate3
dimension.desc: Maximum number of reservoir gate-opening values (columns) for lake rating table 3

dimension.name: ngate4
dimension.desc: Maximum number of reservoir gate-opening values (columns) for lake rating table 4

dimension.name: nglres
dimension.desc: Number of reservoirs in a glacier

dimension.name: ngw
dimension.desc: Number of GWRs

dimension.name: ngwcell
dimension.desc: Number of spatial units in the target map for mapped results

dimension.name: nhru
dimension.desc: Number of HRUs

dimension.name: nhrucell
dimension.desc: Number of unique intersections between HRUs and spatial units of a target map for mapped results

dimension.name: nhumid
dimension.desc: Number of relative humidity measurement stations

dimension.name: nlake
dimension.desc: Number of lakes

dimension.name: nlakeelev
dimension.desc: Maximum number of lake elevations for any rating table data set

dimension.name: nlake_hrus
dimension.desc: Number of lake HRUs

dimension.name: nlapse
dimension.desc: Number of lapse rates in X, Y, and Z directions

dimension.name: nmap
dimension.desc: Number of spatial units in mapped climate

dimension.name: nmap2hru
dimension.desc: Number of intersections between HRUs and spatial units in mapped climate

dimension.name: nmonths
dimension.desc: Number of months in a year

dimension.name: nobs
dimension.desc: Number of streamflow-measurement stations

dimension.name: npoigages
dimension.desc: Number of POI gages

dimension.name: nrain
dimension.desc: Number of precipitation-measurement stations

dimension.name: nratetbl
dimension.desc: Number of rating-table data sets for lake elevations

dimension.name: nsegment
dimension.desc: Number of stream-channel segments

dimension.name: nsnow
dimension.desc: Number of snow-depth-measurement stations

dimension.name: nsol
dimension.desc: Number of solar-radiation measurement stations

dimension.name: nssr
dimension.desc: Number of subsurface reservoirs

dimension.name: nstage
dimension.desc: Maximum number of lake elevations values (rows) for lake rating table 1

dimension.name: nstage2
dimension.desc: Maximum number of lake elevations values (rows) for lake rating table 2

dimension.name: nstage3
dimension.desc: Maximum number of lake elevations values (rows) for lake rating table 3

dimension.name: nstage4
dimension.desc: Maximum number of lake elevations values (rows) for lake rating table 4

dimension.name: nstreamtemp
dimension.desc: Number of stream temperature measurement stations

dimension.name: nsub
dimension.desc: Number of internal subbasins

dimension.name: ntemp
dimension.desc: Number of air-temperature-measurement stations

dimension.name: nwateruse
dimension.desc: Number of water-use data sets

dimension.name: nwind
dimension.desc: Number of wind-speed measurement stations

dimension.name: one
dimension.desc: Dimension of scalar parameters and variables

dimension.name: seven
dimension.desc: Number of glacier variables in real array
